TopicTitle: Need some help building stock electric propellers

Articles.Content:
I built an electric powered plane as shown (click for higher resolution)

I used the 5 RCS balls as bearing, there is a similar group at the back near the docking port. I managed to takeoff and fly it for a few minutes at 100m/s, then the entire propeller group manage dislodged and fell out. I don't understand why that happens and how can I fix that? Thx.

 

Edited January 15, 2019 by TheFlyingKerman

It happens because your propeller and the rest of your airplane are two separate craft, only held together by collisions, and 100 m/s is too fast for the game engine to keep everything updated perfectly.

To improve it a little, you can reduce your physics delta stepsize to .03 if you haven't already. But that's as far as it will go.
